channel.title: kotlin on Simba's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in kotlin on Simba's Blog

item.title: beginning of kotlin
item.description: val vs var kotlin JS val const var let a..b kotlin JS a..b Array(b-a+1).fill(0).map(i => i + a) when kotlin fun main (){ val luckyNum = 4 val yourNum = (1..6).random() val result = when(yourNum){ luckyNum -> "You get the lucky num ${luckyNum}" 1 -> "Sorry, you get 1" 2 -> "Sorry, you get 2" 3 -> "Sorry, you get 3" 4 -> "Sorry, you get 4" 5 -> "Sorry, you get 5" 6 -> "Sorry, you get 6" else -> "Sorry, you get a number out of 1.
